Stoke Library

Manager: Charmain Osborne

High School, Maidenhall Approach, Ipswich
IP2 8PL

  • Tel: 01473 681751
  • Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk
  • Friends group: Friends of Stoke Library
  • Facebook

Branch updates

Stoke Library is looking for Home Library Service volunteers.

Opening hours

Day Hours
Monday Closed
Tuesday 0930 – 1230, 1400 – 1700
Wednesday 1400 – 1700
Thursday 1400 – 1700
Friday 0930 – 1230
Saturday 0930 – 1230
Sunday 1000 – 1300

Branch facilities

  • Accessibility information
  • Payments: cash, cheques and cards accepted
  • Parking: available on school site
  • Customer toilet
  • Free sanitary products available

IT and printing facilities

  • Free wifi
  • Book a computer
  • Photocopying: available on printer
  • Colour printing: available
  • Scan to email
  • Printing, photocopying & scanning charges

Regular events and activities

Children’s events

Craft activities: for primary school age children

Saturday, 0930-1230

Story, rhymes and play for pre-school children

Tuesday, 1000-1130

Find out more about Wordplay

Sunday Sessions: for all ages

Sunday, 1030-1230

Enjoy games including Rummikub, Scrabble and chess, play with Lego, do some mindful colouring or simply relax and look at a book. Free refreshments available (donations appreciated). Under 8s must be accompanied.

Reading groups

Read and Relax book group

last Thursday of the month, 1400-1500

Contact Katie Adams on 01473 683424 or katie36adams@gmail.com for more information.

Arts, crafts & games

Adult colouring group

Friday every 2 weeks, 0945-1045

£1 per person including refreshments.

Sunday Sessions: for all ages

Sunday, 1030-1230

Enjoy games including Rummikub, Scrabble and chess, play with Lego, do some mindful colouring or simply relax and look at a book. Free refreshments available (donations appreciated). Under 8s must be accompanied.

Upcoming special events

No upcoming special events.
